description:
Taiki begins to question if their activity as Three Lights is really helping with their goal of finding their missing princess. His frustration continues to grow, to the point where he no longer feels like singing.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Taiki Zesshou! Shinjiru Kokoro o Uta ni Komete
Taiki canta muy bien. La canción trae buenos deseos de un corazón creyente.
Taiki`s Song Filled with Passion and Faith
大気絶唱! 信じる心を歌に込めて
